name: Military Conscription Simulator
description:
Military conscription begins! You are not a human anymore,  you are cannon fodder for your government. Try not to get caught until you are 27 years old or just waste one year of your life!

CONTROLS

LMB - action, use to see through  peephole or attack

RMB - return back or chill at the computer

The satirical game about the stupid regime of military conscription made especially for Trijam # 123: Hide or get caught!

Art - 1.5 hrs

Coding/Godot - 1.25 hrs

Sounds - 0.25 hrs

Music - Bernard Herrmann - Psycho (theme)
